Name: ID
Info: Running number for samples

Name: Date
Info: Local date

Name: Time (local)
Info: Local time

Name: Lat (DecDeg)
Info: Measured with CastAway CTD.

Name: Lon (DecDeg)
Info: Measured with CastAway CTD.

Name: Temperature (°C)
Info: Measured in situ with a CastAway CTD.

Name: EC (µS/cm)
Info: Measured in situ with a CastAway CTD.

Name: Discharge (m³/s)
Info: Measured with the SonTek RiverSurveyor.

Name: SPM (mg/L)
Info: The samples for SPM concentration were filtered through a preweighted GF/F-Filter (0.7  µm) and stored at the freezer (-21°C). After transport the filter were thawed and dried in the drying oven and reweighted at the Alfred Wegener Institute Helmholtz Center for Polar and Marine Research (AWI) Potsdam Germany. The concentrations were calculated using the weight difference of the filter (before and after filtering) and the sample volume used for filtering.

Name: aCDOM(254) (1/m)
Info: The CDOM samples were filtered through a 0.45 µm cellulose acetate (CA) filter and immediately stored at the fridge (6 °C). After transport CDOM concentrations were measured with UV/VIS spectrophotometer Lambda 950 (Perkin Elmer) using 5 cm cuvettes at German Research Centre for Geoscience (GFZ) Potsdam Germany.

Name: DOC (mg/L)
Info: The DOC samples were filtered through a 0.45 µm cellulose acetate (CA) filter and acidified with 25 µL HCl Suprapur. They were immediately stored at the fridge (6 °C). After transport DOC concentrations were analyzed using high temperature catalytic oxidation (TOC-L Shimadzu) at the Alfred Wegener Institute Potsdam Helmholtz Center for Polar and Marine Research (AWI) Germany.

Name: TDN (mg/L)
Info: The samples for TDN were filtered through a 0.45 µm cellulose acetate filter and stored at the freezer (-21°C). After transport TDN concentrations were analized by thermocatalytic oxidation (chemiluminescence detection Shimadzu TOC-L) at the Alfred Wegener Institute Helmholtz Center for Polar and Marine Research (AWI) Potsdam Germany.

Name: Al (Âµg/L)
Info: The samples for Al were stored at the freezer (-21°C). After transport the samples were filtered through a 0.45 µm cellulose acetate filter and Al concentrations were measured with inductively coupled plasma optical emission spectroscopy (ICP-OES) using a Perkin-Elmer Optima 8300DV at the Alfred Wegener Institute Helmholtz Center for Polar and Marine Research (AWI) Potsdam Germany.
